message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a price of $92 for the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a better offer. I am willing to pay $88 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm proposing a price of $91 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Let me try one more time. I am willing to pay $89 for the product.
Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a price of $90 for the product.
I understand, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a better offer. I am willing to pay $87 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm proposing a price of $89 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a final offer. I am willing to pay $86 for the product.
